attributes.action: make Trevor Annis's birthday (22nd November) a Bank Holiday
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Trevor Annis is an old fashioned Brit - conscientous and a good family man. In order to celebrate these values we would like Trevor's birthday to be a Bank Holiday in order to celebrate all the other people who are what is good about Britain.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
